meanings.definition: A large helmet, typically covering the whole head and neck.
meanings.sent1: The knight's heaume protected his entire head during battle.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to wear your heaume for safety when riding a motorcycle.
meanings.sent3: The heaume was so big that it made the knight look like a walking metal pumpkin.
meanings.sent4: His heaume was like a fortress, shielding him from any harm.
meanings.sent5: The shiny heaume gleamed in the sunlight, a symbol of strength and protection.

meanings.definition: To put on or wear a heaume.
meanings.sent1: She carefully heaumed herself before entering the jousting competition.
meanings.sent2: Remember to heaume up before you ride your bike.
meanings.sent3: He comically heaumed his head with a cooking pot, pretending to be a knight.
meanings.sent4: She heaumed her heart with courage before facing the challenging task.
meanings.sent5: As he heaumed the helmet, he felt a sense of readiness and determination wash over him.
